code: import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';export var appSlice=createSlice({name:'app',initialState:{roomId:null},reducers:{enterRoom:function enterRoom(state,action){state.roomId=action.payload.roomId;}}});var enterRoom=appSlice.actions.enterRoom;export{enterRoom};export var selectRoomId=function selectRoomId(state){return state.app.roomId;};export default appSlice.reducer;
